title: Being Human
description: A vampire must do one thing: Survive.Nothing else matters, but Tommy is finding the hard way survival isn’t that easy. The hunt for blood is tricky when humans know to fear the night. Bloodlust sits on the edge of his mind, urging him to become the monsters humans think he is. Vampire Forces, a special branch of police is determined to turn every vampire to ash. Tommy included.The only human Tommy trusts is his twin brother. A powerful bond reached beyond death to connect them. But even with Danny’s help, Tommy struggles to understand the human world he left behind when he died. As the number of humans who mean more to Tommy than a meal grows, he’ll be forced to decide which instinct is stronger: human or vampire.Can a vampire who doesn’t remember being human learn what it means to be human?
author: Patricia Josephine Lynne
